data.name: Pixel drawing block
data.detailed_description:
Pixel drawing block is a leisure and nourishing game. In the game, you need to fill in the block according to the prompts of the number to complete the hidden graphic. You need to push the density according to the value, and the results graphic will be obtained after completing the topic.

Tutorial.
Save the game at any time.
No advertisement, no internal purchase.
The boss key is convenient to touch the fish during work.
Key update levels.

data.supported_languages:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
